Package game.characters.enemies.skeletons

Class HeavySkeletalSwordsman

java.lang.Object
game.engine.actors.Actor
game.characters.enemies.skeletons.Skeleton
game.characters.enemies.skeletons.HeavySkeletalSwordsman
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpecialDeath, Capable, Printable, IRune, Resettable
public class HeavySkeletalSwordsman
extends Skeleton
implements IRune, SpecialDeath
A class that represents a HeavySkeletalSwordsman -> a type of enemy. Becomes Pile of Bones upon Death
Author:
Harshath Muruganantham
See Also:

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
